title: I Cinque Sapori
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Macrobiotic take away with a counter and a few stools inside for seating. Food is mostly vegan with occasional fish. The "piatto unico" costs around 9 euros and includes a small bowl of soup, a dish with grains, legumes, vegetables, and a dessert. Also sells pies, focaccia, and more. The retail area sells organic products.
